title: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: The updating of checkboxes when exporting a zip file takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). During this process, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the operation is in progress.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table during the export process, there is no busy cursor displayed.
EB: During the export process, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the checkboxes are being updated.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Select the option to export a zip file.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the desired file types.
5. Press the 'OK' button.
